title: What's wrong with t-series and our music industry nowadays? - Quora

response.answer_text: Our music industry is fine but about T-SERIES, I have no words to describe my disappointment. COPYING INSTRUMENTAL AND AESTHETICS OF OTHER MUSIC VIDEOS    REMAKE CULTURE   NEPOTISM   MUSIC MAFIAS   MEANINGLESS SONGS GETTING MORE APPRECIATION FROM PUBLIC   BUYING FAKE VIEWS And numerous other reasons. These were the prominent ones, therefore, I mentioned them. Thankfully there are awesome and fantastic musicians who are practically carrying the whole industry on their backs. Hope this plagarism as well as nepotism stops and underrated musicians get more exposure. Regards.
